title: Feedback & Growth

questions.text: When you give me feedback, I prefer it to be...
choices: Direct and honest
Gentle and supportive
Specific with suggestions
At the right moment, not in the heat of things

questions.text: How do I typically respond to constructive criticism?
choices: I appreciate it and try to learn
I need time to process before responding
I can get defensive at first
I welcome it when delivered kindly

questions.text: What makes me most open to hearing feedback?
choices: Knowing it comes from love
When I've asked for it
When it's balanced with positives
When I trust the person giving it

questions.text: When I notice something you could improve, I tend to...
choices: Bring it up gently when the time is right
Wait for you to ask for my thoughts
Lead by example rather than saying it
Be direct because I care about your growth

questions.text: The most helpful feedback you've given me was about...
choices: How I communicate or express myself
How I handle stress or emotions
My habits or behaviors
How I show up in our relationship

description: Learn how to give and receive feedback that helps you both grow.
